SIMPLIFYING YOUR GCC
JOURNEY, EVERY STEP OF THE WAY. Helping you build, manage and scale global teams About Us

Aikya Excellence

We empower businesses like yours to thrive in a rapidly evolving landscape. Whether you’re navigating the complex GCC journey or tackling intricate program management or outsourcing challenges,

Aikya is your trusted partner, dedicated to delivering exceptional results with accountability and excellence. Aikya is a team of highly experienced consultants across the US and India, specialising in assisting clients in achieving their IT objectives and TCO targets through a range of service offerings.

Multi-Level Engagement Models

PMO as a Service

In today’s world there is rapid digital transformation in technology, constantly shifting priorities, demanding stakeholders and time driven delivery for remaining in competition. This requires a strong portfolio and program

Global Capability Center (GCC) setup

Aikya can help you set up a GCC in India that can provide you with a dedicated team of IT or ITes professionals who are focused on your specific needs.

Digital Transformation

In today’s dynamic landscape, embracing digital transformation is no longer an option, it’s a necessity. At Aikya, we empower businesses like yours to thrive in the digital age by offering comprehensive services.
